note.p: Birth: Downing, Whitford parish, near Holywell, Flintshire, Wales (14 June 1726)
Death: Downing, Whitford parish, near Holywell, Flintshire (16 December 1798)
Education: Queen's College, Oxford (matriculated 1744, but took no degree); DCL (1771, Oxford)
Career: Undertook tours and "rambles" in many countries; stayed with Buffon at Montbard (1765); corresponded with Linnaeus
References: Averil M Lysaght, 'Joseph Banks at Skara Brae and Stennis, Orkney, 1772' in NR 1973-4 vol 28 pp 221-234
